item.description:
We'll be meeting at 8pm on the football field at Russell Field which is located next to Alewife Station. We'll play from 8 to 10 - 10:30 and then head to Amy's place for an after-party (Directions to be provided at the end of the game). Bring a change of clothes, gloves and a trash bag to put your stuff in, in case it rains. Before attending our events, please review our About Us page.



We'd recommend you bring a light-colored shirt for visibility's sake and a change of clothes if it's a wet day. We supply all of the equipment necessary so there's really nothing else you need to bring besides your smiling face. :)

Our Organizers pay out of pocket for the frisbees, frisbee batteries, glowsticks, field cones and first aid kits. Consider bringing a couple bucks or visiting our Amazon Wishlist to support our equipment costs. Our group is free and will always be that way but your non-obligatory donations are certainly appreciated!



Click here to see a full Google map of the area. As indicated by the images, there's a parking lot, but please read the parking signs for any special rules concerning parking at or near Russell Field. Should you decide to take the red line to Alewife, look for signs upon exiting that will direct you to Russell Field.



If you have any questions about our group, don't hesitate to contact our organizers! To learn more about their roles, click here. See you on the field!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll either be tossing frisbees or sitting alongside the football field.
item.why: We've created an awesome community of fun people who go out of their way to ensure that everyone feels welcomed and included. We also have fantastic games of Ultimate!
item.name: Illuminated Frisbee on Russell Field
